page.title: 20EDUCATION: TEACHER ACTION.
page.content:
THE NEW DOMESDAY:THE DIFFICULTIES.
The collecting and compiling of this survey was made very difficult by the present Industrial Action taking place in the schools. The teachers of William Farr School, as everywhere else, in England Scotland and Wales followed their Union's instructions to withdraw 'Good-will'. This meant that no meetings could be arranged during, or outside, school hours and no extra work taken on; therefore this enterprise has suffered to some extent. We apologise but we have done our best!
